idea:
Elevator Pitch

This is Samiya Shah and Dr. Samir N Shah Founder Director of Unique Dents Solutions Pvt Ltd. and Unique Dant Seva. 

Unique Dents Solutions Pvt ltd helps Dentists to Decorate their clinic with Dental Themed Products, and we also help dentists to Educate their patients with our Product range of  Dental Educational materials.


Unique Dant Seva provides quality Dental Treatment. We have opened 4 Dental Chains 3 in Mumbai and 1 in Our Native Place Dhule.

With a Decade of Experience in Dentistry, we have come up with Solutions for Dentistry Problems. PROJECT 7RCR.

We are Making India's First AI BASED APP FOR SELF DIAGNOSING 

•      7RCR will be working on Aggregator Business Model. To Make Roof for Highly Unorganized Dental Practice.  7RCR will be the Brand for Dentists across India. Just like OYO for Hotels, OYO FOR DENTISTRY. 

•      Aggregator model will help  7RCR to grow faster soon will become The Largest Dental Clinics Chain in India.
name: Unique Dents

idea:
https://www.sportobuddy.com/

Sportobuddy is a world that celebrates the power of sport through an offering of services, products and content. We began our journey in 2015 when a team of entrepreneurs came together to establish Sportobuddy, a Locobuddy Private Limited initiative.


We are a disruptive online portal and mobile app that integrates sports with technology to deliver a holistic sporting experience using location intelligence. Simply put, you can now book a match at your favourite turf, link up with fellow players, and be a part of sporting events based on where they are, all at the tap of a button. The portal has mapped out a universe of gyms, yoga centres, Zumba studios, adrenaline pumping adventure sports and professional coaching services. We offer a wide selection of sporting apparel, gear and accessories for aspiring athletes.

We aim to work with the existing talent pool created by local communities, across the grassroots-level, education sectors, & especially in the corporate realm - backed by some of the finest coaches and infrastructure in an organised & professional manner.

At Sportobuddy, we believe in creating social communities focussing on an active lifestyle and encouraging them to step out and play, all for the love of the game.
name: Locobuddy Mobile Pvt Ltd

idea: Cosino Drinks aims to be India's best Sparkling Fruit Drinks Brand.
name: JUGGERNAUT BEVERAGES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our mission is to transform behaviour dynamics for individuals in teams for better performance, alignment of culture and enhanced leadership skills using interaction and game play within our learning and development platform.
The company specifically focuses on fundamental issue of bias-ridden thinking that individuals adopt in their daily lives. The primary purpose of all the activities of the company is to help businesses build better teams by helping individuals identify biases and mitigate them through gamification & intelligent mining of content.
We firmly believe that individuals can be trained so that the undesired effect of unconscious biases of individuals can be minimized. This training, however, has to be subtle and persistent. Digital gaming is an effective mode for this, by which we aim to offer businesses an experiential medium for identifying and mitigating biases; combined with content intelligence. Mind of N Lab aspires to help businesses build a problem solving centered culture.
name: COLLECTIVE MIND OF 'N' LAB PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Tanaya is a trainer for Costumer Service
name: Tanaya

idea:
Our vision is to create a world where every individual gets an opportunity to work with great people managers. We are primarily a global digital institute that evaluates, coaches, creates and recognizes great managers. 
Product: Based on our evaluation of possible direct and indirect competitors globally, it is first such product in the world that provides data backed personalized and contextualized evaluation of a manager with respect to the person's people management style. There are digital products that focus on skills of managers, but we focus on style. Style is generally considered an abstract or qualitative concept. But using our in-house experts, we have been able to create a quantitative methodology for the same.
Service: We assess, evaluate, train and certify managers. While being a full stack service provider, our services are personalized in nature.
Scalability in terms of Employment Generation: Apart from making ourselves global, we will be aggregating and curating mentors who can aid the digital learning process for the managers. Both will ensure high scalability in terms of full-time and part-time contractors/ employees.
Scalability in terms of Wealth Creation: Considering there are 3 billion employees in the world, with an average ticket size of around 200 USD per manager, our target market size runs into hundreds of billions of dollars. We will try to capture a very small percentage of the same- focusing on aspiring managers to senior managers.
name: GREAT MANAGER RESEARCH & CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED
